description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-43582) in the Remote Desktop Protocol server:

1. Download the applicable updates for your system version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Install the updates to patch the vulnerability effectively.
3. Restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- Ensure you are using the following build numbers for your Windows version:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: 10.0.26100.2033
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.4317
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2: 10.0.22621.4317
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2: 10.0.22000.3260
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.5011
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2: 10.0.19044.5011
- For installation, use the following KB articles to guide the update process:
  - KB5044284, KB5044285, KB5044280, KB5044273.
- Update packages can be found at:
  - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
  - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is one of the supported versions listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of updates.
